com.gensym.jgi
Class G2ConnectionEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.gensym.jgi.G2ConnectionEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
G2CommunicationErrorEvent
public class G2ConnectionEvent
extends EventObject

A event object that encapsulates information fired during a G2Connection event.

See Also:
